item.title: Help with java program
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

I’ve been messing around with GUI’s a little more to get more familiar with them and i was wondering why i get this error. Here is my GUI class:

package serverchecker;

import java.awt.event.KeyEvent;
import java.io.IOException;
import javax.swing.*;
import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.awt.event.KeyListener;
import javax.swing.GroupLayout.ParallelGroup;
import javax.swing.GroupLayout.SequentialGroup;

/**
 *
 * @author Lester Knome
 */
public class GUI extends JFrame implements ActionListener, KeyListener {

    final static Color  ONLINE = Color.GREEN;
    final static Color  OFFLINE = Color.RED;


    public GUI() {
        super("Lester Knome's Server Checker");

        synchronized(this) {

            this.enter = new JButton("Check Status!");
            this.enterButton = new JPanel();

            this.layout = new GroupLayout(getContentPane());
            this.getContentPane().setLayout(layout);
            this.layout.setAutoCreateGaps(true);
            this.layout.setAutoCreateContainerGaps(true);
            this.ipLine = layout.createSequentialGroup();
            this.portLine = layout.createSequentialGroup();
            this.portLine1 = layout.createParallelGroup(GroupLayout.Alignment.CENTER);
            this.portLine2 = layout.createParallelGroup(GroupLayout.Alignment.CENTER);
            this.ipLine1 = layout.createParallelGroup(GroupLayout.Alignment.CENTER);
            this.ipLine2 = layout.createParallelGroup(GroupLayout.Alignment.CENTER);
            this.getPort = new JTextField(25);
            this.getIp = new JTextField(25);
            this.center = new JPanel();
            this.portText = new JLabel();
            this.ipText = new JLabel();


            this.init(); // Start up the GUI
            
        }
    }

    private void init() {
        synchronized(this) {
            super.setSize(500, 200);

            this.portText.setText("Server Port:");
            this.ipText.setText("Server Ip:");

            this.ipLine1.addComponent(ipText);
            this.ipLine2.addComponent(getIp);
            this.portLine1.addComponent(portText);
            this.portLine2.addComponent(getPort);
            this.ipLine.addGroup(ipLine1);
            this.ipLine.addGroup(ipLine2);
            this.portLine.addGroup(portLine1);
            this.portLine.addGroup(portLine2);
            this.layout.setHorizontalGroup(ipLine);
            this.layout.setHorizontalGroup(portLine);
            this.enter.setSize(10, 10);
            enterButton.add(enter);
            super.getContentPane().add(BorderLayout.SOUTH, enterButton);
            enter.addActionListener(this);

            super.setVisible(true);
            super.setResizable(false);
        }
    }

    public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {

    }

    public void keyTyped(KeyEvent e) {

    }

    public void keyPressed(KeyEvent e) {

    }

    public void keyReleased(KeyEvent e) {

    }

    // Gui components
    private JButton enter;
    private JPanel enterButton;
    private JTextField getPort;
    private JTextField getIp;
    private JPanel center;
    private JLabel portText;
    private JLabel ipText;
    private ParallelGroup ipLine1;
    private ParallelGroup ipLine2;
    private ParallelGroup portLine1;
    private ParallelGroup portLine2;
    private SequentialGroup ipLine;
    private SequentialGroup portLine;
    private GroupLayout layout;

}

Here is the error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.IllegalStateException: javax.swing.JLabel[,0,0,0x0,invalid,alignmentX=0.0,alignmentY=0.0,border=,flags=8388608,maximumSize=,minimumSize=,preferredSize=,defaultIcon=,disabledIcon=,horizontalAlignment=LEADING,horizontalTextPosition=TRAILING,iconTextGap=4,labelFor=,text=Server Ip:,verticalAlignment=CENTER,verticalTextPosition=CENTER] is not attached to a horizontal group
        at javax.swing.GroupLayout.checkComponents(GroupLayout.java:1065)
        at javax.swing.GroupLayout.prepare(GroupLayout.java:1019)
        at javax.swing.GroupLayout.layoutContainer(GroupLayout.java:889)
        at java.awt.Container.layout(Container.java:1421)
        at java.awt.Container.doLayout(Container.java:1410)
        at java.awt.Container.validateTree(Container.java:1507)
        at java.awt.Container.validateTree(Container.java:1513)
        at java.awt.Container.validateTree(Container.java:1513)
        at java.awt.Container.validateTree(Container.java:1513)
        at java.awt.Container.validate(Container.java:1480)
        at java.awt.Window.show(Window.java:860)
        at java.awt.Component.show(Component.java:1563)
        at java.awt.Component.setVisible(Component.java:1515)
        at java.awt.Window.setVisible(Window.java:841)
        at serverchecker.GUI.init(GUI.java:75)
        at serverchecker.GUI.<init>(GUI.java:48)
        at serverchecker.Main.main(Main.java:14)
Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.IllegalStateException: javax.swing.JLabel[,0,0,0x0,invalid,alignmentX=0.0,alignmentY=0.0,border=,flags=8388608,maximumSize=,minimumSize=,preferredSize=,defaultIcon=,disabledIcon=,horizontalAlignment=LEADING,horizontalTextPosition=TRAILING,iconTextGap=4,labelFor=,text=Server Ip:,verticalAlignment=CENTER,verticalTextPosition=CENTER] is not attached to a horizontal group
        at javax.swing.GroupLayout.checkComponents(GroupLayout.java:1065)
        at javax.swing.GroupLayout.prepare(GroupLayout.java:1019)
        at javax.swing.GroupLayout.layoutContainer(GroupLayout.java:889)
        at java.awt.Container.layout(Container.java:1421)
        at java.awt.Container.doLayout(Container.java:1410)
        at java.awt.Container.validateTree(Container.java:1507)
        at java.awt.Container.validateTree(Container.java:1513)
        at java.awt.Container.validateTree(Container.java:1513)
        at java.awt.Container.validateTree(Container.java:1513)
        at java.awt.Container.validate(Container.java:1480)
        at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Window.java:2473)
        at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Component.java:4460)
        at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(EventQueue.java:599)
        at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(EventDispatchThread.java:269)
        at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(EventDispatchThread.java:184)
        at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(EventDispatchThread.java:174)
        at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:169)
        at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:161)
        at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(EventDispatchThread.java:122)
